title: Noam Chomsky - 1992-11-2X - On Linguistics - Interviewed in Barcelona -  Improved Sound
description:
Be sure to pick at least 720p for best sound quality.
Sometime, during his visit to Catalonia in 1992, Noam Chomsky was interviewed at Hotel Colon in Barcelona, Spain.


I gave the audio an extensive restoration, digital noise reduction, and going over it second by second to reduce or eliminate all the major audio problems - mostly loud coughs - that I could.  There's some transient distortion, possibly from damage to the video tape.  All in all, it turned out very nicely.  



The source video was a low bitrate, 360p multi-gen copy, alas.  If you know of a better, please leave a comment to that effect.



Thanks to Danielle Whitis @daniellewhitis1732 for the upload: 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0-guF4XVqL8


Tags:


Chomsky, 1993, Barcalona, Innate Structure, Plato, René Descartes, Gottfried Wilhelm Leibniz, Cartesian Rationalism, David Hume, Down's Syndrome, Isaac Newton, Mind/Body problem, Artificial Intelligence, Kant, Jean-Jacques Rousseau, Language, Linguistics, Prescriptive Grammer,
